text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Automobile graveyard" has the meaning stated in § 8-801 of the Transportation Article.
"Automotive dismantler and recycler facility" has the meaning stated in § 8-801 of the Transportation Article.
"Junkyard" has the meaning stated in § 8-801 of the Transportation Article.
"Scrap metal processing facility" has the meaning stated in § 8-801 of the Transportation Article.
